answers.answer: Find another midwife. Someone who is a better fit and makes you feel comfortable. I had to ditch one.
Hi thanks I didn't know you could ? X
Yes you can always find a new doctor. Don't allow her to scare you. You should feel comfortable with her.

I get hbp ONLY when I go to the doctor. I have "white coat syndrome ". Could it be anxiety related? My doctor had me so nervous and anxious telling me I'm at risk of preeclampsia even after I told him I get so nervous coming to the doctor and my blood pressure is normal at home that I was excessively taking my bp at home and researching bp on the internet.

question: Midwife has scared me I dread going to see her !!!as I am a high risk pregnancy now to top it my blood pressure is though the roof back new year eve I feel absolutely fine x
title: high blood pressure
